testcase.classname: Show appointments for patients by Staff
testcase.name: TC_01, TC_02, TC_03 Staff edit appointments
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to home page and Sign in with staff credentials.............passed And Navigate to "search-patient" page and searches patient with SSN........passed And View and Verifies that the patient searched with SSN is displayed......passed And Click Show Appointments button and verify...............................passed Then Click edit button from an appointment and verify.......................passed Then Select the status from dropdown and verify.............................passed Then Leave blank Anamnesis, Treatment, Diagnosis and verify.................passed Then Close the application..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Show appointments for patients by Staff
testcase.name: TC_04 Staff can select the current doctor that needs to be selected for the patient
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to home page and Sign in with staff credentials.............passed And Navigate to "search-patient" page and searches patient with SSN........passed And View and Verifies that the patient searched with SSN is displayed......passed And Click Show Appointments button and verify...............................passed Then Click edit button from an appointment and verify.......................passed Then Select Physician from dropdown and verify..............................passed Then Close the application..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Show appointments for patients by Staff
testcase.name: TC_05 Staff can view the patients test results
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to home page and Sign in with staff credentials.............passed And Navigate to "search-patient" page and searches patient with SSN........passed And View and Verifies that the patient searched with SSN is displayed......passed And Click Show Appointments button and verify...............................passed Then Click Show Tests button from an appointment and verify.................passed Then Close the application..................................................passed
